cast.name: 丹尼尔·迪马吉奥 Daniel DiMaggio
福雷斯特·惠勒 Forrest Wheeler
迈尔斯·特鲁伊特 Myles Truitt
乔治娜·彭伯顿 Georgia Pemberton

introduction: Last year, a serial killer styling himself as 'Dracula' terrorized a sleepy town near Mt. Shasta, California. SEAN KING's police officer dad sacrificed himself to end Dracula's reign of terror. This year, kids are disappearing again. And now, it's up to Sean, a 15 year-old high school kid, and his classmates PATRICK and LUKE, to solve the mystery. After band practice, they're going to have to face the Mothman, zombies, the Mummy, the Wolfman, and - Dracula's Son. Thankfully, their garage rock band's hot lead singer KRISTEN is a white witch who's full of tricks. But when the stakes get pulled out, and portals start to open, the group must literally fight to save the world. Can Sean lead the squad to become 'light warriors' against the forces of darkness? Or will his skepticism divide his friends and keep them from banding together to defeat the monsters of childhood's lore? Written by S. Stone
